posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up any beaters of Grover Alexander.  I would prefer to trade, but I might be able to swing a purchase, too.  The cards can be from 1911 all the way up to 2013.  Right now, any year is fine for me.  Thanks!

Jimi

There are no less than 6 in our auction, in case you didn't see them.....and a few are really scarce and still very cheap..they are lot 53, 57, 390, 391,396, 399

[url]http://b-lauctions-com.si-sv2521.com/Catalog.aspx[/url]

[quote name="Leon" post=1185938]There are no less than 6 in our auction, in case you didn't see them.....and a few are really scarce and still very cheap..they are lot 53, 57, 390, 391,396, 399

[url]http://b-lauctions-com.si-sv2521.com/Catalog.aspx[/url][/QUOTE]

Thanks, Leon.  I'll check them out.  I haven't had a chance to go all through your auction just yet.  I was going to wait until the weekend.  Thanks!
